Lyric:
[00:00.00]Eminem - Never Enough (Feat. 50 Cent & Nate Dogg)
 

[Eminem]

[00:00.49]There's not much you could do or say to phase me

[00:02.82]People think I'm a little bit crazy

[00:04.60]I get it from all angles, even occasionally Doc Dre-zie'll

[00:07.86]Have to step in every once in a while to save me

[00:10.23]To make me stop and think about it 'fore I just say things

[00:12.75]Sometimes I forget what other people just may think

[00:15.30]A lot of rappers finally wouldn't know how to take me

[00:17.70]If they heard some shit, I'd lay the tape 'fore they erase me

[00:20.26]I maybe a little too fast paced and racy

[00:22.71]Sometimes the average listener rewinds and plays me twenty times

[00:25.65]cuz I say so many rhymes,

[00:26.96]it may seem like I'm goin too fast cuz my mind is racing

[00:30.19]And I could give a fuck what category you place me

[00:32.66]Long as when I'm pushing up daisies and gone

[00:34.83]As long as you place me amongst one of them greats

[00:37.42]When I hit the heavenly gates I'll be cool beside Jay-Z

[00:40.27]For every single die hard fan who embraced me

[00:42.60]I'm thankful for the talent in which God gave me

[00:45.09]And I'm thankful for the environment that he placed me

[00:47.51]Believe it or not, I thank my mom for how she raised me

[00:50.06]In the neighborhood daily, they jumped and chased me

[00:52.59]It only made me what I am today, see

[00:54.94]Regardless of what anybody believes who hates me

[00:57.59]You ain't gonna make or break me

[00:59.22]Tryna strip me of my credibility and make me look fake, G

[01:02.48]You're only gonna be in for a rude awakening

[01:04.89]Cuz sooner or later you haters are all gonna face me

[01:07.48]And when you face me with all the shit you've been saving to say to me

[01:10.60]You had all this time to think about it

[01:12.27]Now don't pussy out and try to wimp out, face me

[01:14.95]Cuz I've been patiently waiting for the day

[01:17.08]That we finally meet in the same place to see

[01:19.43]

[Chorus x2]
[Nate Dogg]

[01:29.63][01:19.77]No matter how many battles I been in and won

[01:32.13][01:22.24]No matter how many magazines on my nuts

[01:34.65][01:24.63]No matter how many emcees I end up

[01:37.25][01:28.01]Ooh ooh, it's never enough

[01:39.42]

[50 Cent]

[01:39.79]My flow's untouchable now you gotta face it

[01:42.19]Uh oh, it gets worse when I go back to the basics

[01:44.78]You go say the wrong shit and get your face split

[01:47.28]The smell of victory, love it so much I can taste it

[01:49.81]The spot my talk, it blaze a direct hit

[01:51.97]Graze it, your peace talk, save it

[01:53.56]You shit sounds dated, you're overrated

[01:55.73]I'm obligated to study your moves then crush you mutherfuckers

[01:59.76]If I'm the best and the worst, then God's gift is a curse

[02:02.26]Soldier trained to destroy, you payin' attention boy?

[02:04.68]I spit shit, slick shit, so quick you miss it

[02:07.19]To be specific I go ballistic as hieroglyphic

[02:09.74]My music is a drug, press play, you ain't gotta sniff it

[02:12.21]Chew it or pop it, roll a bag of the chocolate

[02:14.57]Get your high over and over, but you gotta cop it

[02:17.06]When it's hot, it's hot

[02:17.98]Your hatin' is undeniable, stop it

[02:19.34]

[Chorus x2]

[02:29.32][02:19.63]No matter how many battles I been in and won

[02:31.79][02:21.93]No matter how many magazines on my nuts

[02:34.27][02:24.34]No matter how many emcees I end up

[02:36.92][02:27.58]Ooh ooh, it's never enough
